r.d: Decodes Ogg file headers to provide metadata. Supports Vorbis, Theora, Speex and FLAC stream headers. This package does NOT provide codecs for these formats.
r.n: * Updated to the version in MediaWiki trunk r71623 * Fixed bug in theora length calculation (was always zero) * Updated to handle oggz_chop files * Provide access to stream offset time * Optimised memory usage, should now be able to process arbitrarily large files
